description: Configuration file defining a biome for a data pack for Minecraft

depth.description:
Used for terrain noise generation. Biomes with positive depth are considered land, biomes with negative depth are oceans
https://minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/Custom_biome

scale.description:
Used for terrain noise generation. Vertically stretches the terrain. Lower values produce flatter terrain
https://minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/Custom_biome

precipitation.description:
A type of precipitation for the current biome
https://minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/Custom_biome

temperature.description:
A temperature for the current biome
https://minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/Custom_biome

temperature_modifier.description:
A temperature modifier for the current biome
https://minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/Custom_biome

downfall.description:
A grass and foliage color for the current biome
https://minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/Custom_biome

creature_spawn_friendly.description:
Spawns passive mobs as long as random value is less than this
https://minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/Custom_biome

effects.title: effect options
effects.description:
Effect options for the current biome
https://minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/Custom_biome

foliage_color.description:
Decimal value converted from Hex color to use for tree leaves and vines. If not present, the value depends on humidity and temperature
https://minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/Custom_biome

water_fog_color.description:
Decimal value converted from Hex color to use for fog
https://minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/Custom_biome

https://minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/Custom_biome

block_search_context.description:
Determines the cubic range of possible positions to play the mood sound. The player is at the center of the cubic range, and the edge length is 2 * block_search_extent + 1
https://minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/Custom_biome

music.title: music
music.description:
Specific music that should be played in the biome
https://minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/Custom_biome

replace_current_music.description:
Whether or not to replace music which is already playing
https://minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/Custom_biome

surface_builder.description:
The namespaced id of the configured surface builder to use
https://minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/Custom_biome

air.description:
List of carvers used during the air generation step
https://minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/Custom_biome

items.description:
The namespaced id of a configured carver
https://minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/Custom_biome

liquid.description: List of carvers used during the liquid generation step

items.description:
The namespaced id of a configured carver
https://minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/Custom_biome

features.description:
A list of 10 lists of features. In vanilla, each of the 10 lists corresponds to a different type of feature: the feature lists are applied to each chunk in order from top to bottom. The index of the list which the feature is placed in is also used to generate part of the feature seed, so moving features to a different list definitely has some effect on generation. Each element of each list is a namespaced ID of a configured feature. Can be a empty list
https://minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/Custom_biome

starts.description:
The structures to generate in this biome
https://minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/Custom_biome

items.description:
The namespaced ID of a configured structure feature
https://minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/Custom_biome

title: minecraft data pack biome
